name: Offroad Bus Driving Skill
description:
Offroad Bus Driving Skillis an outstanding game that lets you to be an extreme tourist bus driver. Wonderful 3D mountain environment, real bus engine physics, and movement of passengers and tourists will make you feel like an actual bus driver.
Features
• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Extreme off road stunts
• Character Animations
• Free and carrier mode
• HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
• Realistic controls over the offroad environment
• Easy and free to use
